snippet: England's humiliating series defeat in India painfully exposed an alarming paucity in the side's slow bowling options and drove home the fact they will continue to struggle in South Asia until they unearth some world class spinners....
lead_paragraph: England's humiliating series defeat in India painfully exposed an alarming paucity in the side's slow bowling options and drove home the fact they will continue to struggle in South Asia until they unearth some world class spinners.

headline.main: Bleak Future Beckons for England's Weak Tweakers
headline.print_headline: Bleak Future Beckons for England's Weak Tweakers
